meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lew Fox Sue O'Donnell Virginia Sielen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #570.

td.p: Lew Fox, a retired businessman originally from Floral Park, New York
Sue O'Donnell, a registered nurse from DeWitt, New York
Virginia Sielen, a homemaker from Oakton, Virginia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $8,599)

tr.td: GAMES
YELLOW SONGS
OLD TESTAMENT
TRANSPORTATION
IN OTHER WORDS...

div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_DJ_1_5', 'clue_DJ_1_5_stuck', 'Only city mentioned in the following song is this one in N. Africa:

"See the pyramids along the Nile /
Watch the sunrise on a tropic isle /
Just remember darlin\' all the while..."')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

Only city mentioned in the following song is this one in N. Africa:
"See the pyramids along the Nile /
Watch the sunrise on a tropic isle /
Just remember darlin' all the while..."

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_2_5', 'clue_DJ_2_5_stuck', '(Sue: What is a [*]?)
[Sue was ruled incorrect and after the last clue of the Double Jeopardy! round she had -1100 with Alex saying goodbye to her. After Alex revealed the Final Jeopardy! category he let Sue know her response was acceptable and that she would be playing in the Final Jeopardy! round.]

woodpecker* (sapsucker)

Sue
')

toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '[Alex and the judges took a little bit of time to decide that Lew\'s response was acceptable.]
SueWhat was to walk on the moon?
$100
LewWhat is visiting the moon?
$4,500
VirginiaWhat is walk on the moon?
$1,701
walk on the Moon')

tr.td: FAMOUS LASTS
The very last to do this so far was Eugene Cernan
Virginia
Sue
Lew

3rd place: Tappan microwave
2nd place: Broyhill 6-piece oak bedroom set + the quality of comfort (bedding) from The Company Store
Virginia
Sue
Lew

12 R,
5 W
(including 2 DDs)

14 R
(including 1 DD),
2 W
